messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: [A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine you are a film director looking for producers to invest. You can talk to either of your two friends, Nora and Philip. Nora is married to Peter who is friends with Shikha. Shikha knows Gal who can introduce to Alex. Alex can introduce you to David, who can invest $1M in your movie. But you do not take it, you're just learning about the environment. Then you exit and start over. Philip is friends with Yakub who can introduce you to Ajay. Ajay is friends with Joe who is married to Rachel. Rachel's brother Harry has $5M budget for producing a movie. But you do not take anything, you're just learning about the environment. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most money. Which friend of yours will lead to the path where one can find the most money?

Choose the path which lead to a path that leads to the path that leads to the most money.
user: Imagine Nora and Philip are both unemployed. Instead of looking for jobs, they start their own business. They will create a movie which raises $1.5M from Nora's brother David who's a big investor. After that, they will split the money 50/50. They have one film and they have $750K which one of them will decide to spend. If they both decided to spend it, they will have $375K each. What will they spend it on?
user: You have been assigned a 100-question exam. It will take 10 seconds to enter the next question. You have to answer 48 questions. You will have only 20 seconds to work on each question. You will lose 3 points for every second that passes by. Every time you answer an easy question correct, your score increases by 10 points. For every wrong answer, you will lose 1 point. There will be no negative marks for remaining questions. The exam will end as soon as you answer all 100 questions.

first of all, however, is most difficult, and, if you get through that, you need only cleanse.
2019: The first 2019 question was answered with a "1" being marked correct in the regular expression in 14.56 seconds with a score of 11.0. The user answered 48 / 100 questions correctly.
2019: To solve this problem, the user first thought step by step. First, they realized that they were the AI assistant and they could ask it questions. Whenever a question was asked that the user didn't know, it thought by taking one step backwards. This is an instance of recursive thinking, where a thinking process itself is the input and the output of that process. It then continued this thinking process until they arrived at the final outcome.
The question they were facing was: "I had a dream that I worked at McDonald's." The user chose to interpret this task as a machine learning problem. First, they built a machine learning model to classify all three

You now have a new friend Rajeev who can introduce you to Sophia. Sophia can introduce you to Faisal who can introduce you to Anurag. Anurag can introduce you to Imran who can introduce you to Guneet. Guneet gives you the app where you can be friends with anyone you want. When you choose the path that leads to the most money, you discover that the regular way to get introduced to the person with the most money is blocked. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most money. Which friend of yours will lead to the path where one can find the most money?
